author: ieb
msg: Converting PersonDb to Json using BeanJson fails with the following exception:

Caused by: java.lang.IllegalAccessException: Class org.apache.shindig.social.core.util.BeanJsonConverter can not access a member of class org.apache.shindig.social.opensocial.jpa.PersonDb$1 with modifiers "public"

author: rwatler
msg: Distributed Database Page Manager EhCache Cache Backport
- backport of feature committed to 2.2 trunk
- configure via cache.xml cacheManagerConfig.defaultConfigResource bean property:
- additional properties can also be configured using the cacheManagerConfig bean, (see EhCacheConfigResource.java)

author: ieb
msg: q.setFirstResult() in PersonServiceDb.getPerson() is being set to 1 where it should be set to 0. This bug ensures that q.getResultList() will always return an empty list, which results in PersonServiceDb.getPerson() always returning null.

author: manjula
msg: Adding fixes for httpd for Axis2C-1301.
